Classification: Stablehand Grade 1 (after three months’continuous employment with the employer)
Stablehand Grade 2 (who has at least two years in the industry and whose duties are above those required of a Grade 1 employee)
Apprentice jockey (minimum wage payable to an apprentice jockey is to be calculated by applying the relevant percentage in clause 13.6(a),(b) &(c) to the track rider minimum weekly wage)
